General.Name: Shaanxi Beiyuan Chemical Industry Group Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shaanxi Beiyuan Chemical Industry Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells salt chemicals in China. It offers polyvinyl chloride, caustic soda, PVC resin, cement, hydrochloric acid, calcium carbide product clusters, alkali acid, and other products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Yulin, China.
